About Ghost:
At Ghost, we are building a cloud scale security platform for the modern enterprise. Our founding team are veterans of the cyber security industry with decades of experience building teams and products for the most demanding commercial and public sector organizations. Ghost is backed by top tier venture firms and is on a mission to raise the bar of what is possible and what is expected of modern enterprise security tools and platforms. We are a remote-first and globally distributed team. Our philosophy is based on the principles of learning, collaboration, transparency, experimentation, and passion.

•  We are outcome-driven and dedicated
•  We are customer-obsessed
•  We believe in people's ability to grow
•  We believe enterprise software can be beautiful

About the Role:
We are looking for Cloud Infrastructure Engineers to help us build robust and scalable systems that power our security platform. As a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer at Ghost, you will help to scale and improve our infrastructure, availability, and reliability by working closely with our backend engineers and product team to identify problems, and create tooling and automation. If you have a solid background in software engineering and are familiar with Cloud Services (e.g. AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure), building automation tooling with Python, and/or using Infrastructure as Code tools like Terraform, we want to meet you.

Ghost is growing fast and the Infrastructure team is no exception. The role is dynamic - you should be comfortable designing systems, writing code, and troubleshooting systems in production. Our infrastructure team orchestrates deployment and hosting of our platform through capabilities and tooling we maintain that leverage our own and other cloud providers' infrastructure for networking, storage, compute and data.

About Ghost:

Our founding team are veterans of the cyber security industry with decades of experience building teams and products for the most demanding commercial and public sector organizations. Ghost is backed by top tier venture firms and is on a mission to raise the bar of what is possible and what is expected of modern enterprise security tools and platforms. •  We are outcome-driven and dedicated
•  We are customer-obsessed
•  We believe in people's ability to grow
•  We believe enterprise software can be beautiful

About the Role:
We are looking for Engineering Managers to help us build and lead engineering teams that are building our application security and risk management platform. As a Senior Engineering Manager you will lead a team of 3-5 engineers that are developing, testing, and deploying one or more focused service components within our SaaS platform.

Our tech stack is a combination of rock solid, proven technologies, with a heavy dose of automation and modern DevOps practices baked in. Our frontend applications are built with modern JavaScript frameworks. Our backend services are built with a mix of Python and Go and leverage a number of cloud-native services as well some unique implementations of certain datastores and compute patterns that make the Ghost platform unique.

We prioritize customer time-to-value above all else. We don't chase programming language trends. We leverage bullet proof, proven technologies in new and novel ways to achieve meaningful and valuable outcomes for our customers.  If this sounds like an environment you'd thrive in and you have a solid background in managing engineering teams, we want to meet you.

Ghost is growing fast and the engineering team is no exception. The role is fully engaged - meaning you will be writing code in addition to setting development standards, and guiding/mentoring the members of your engineering team. You'll need to be comfortable collaborating closely with other engineering teams, product managers, executives, and design partner customers to deliver an exceptional user experience for our customers.
